A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great writing. Great cast. Where do you begin with a film that is this great. Rian Johnson came up with an amazing story and his cast did a terrific job of putting it together. This film answers the big question from The Force Awakens in a great way. We learn about what happened between Kylo and his mentor Luke. We learn the true nature of Rey's past. All with amazing twists and turns. I can't recommend this film enough.
